clues.normalClue: An anagram of NUTS meaning shock

parts.hint: Anagram fodder; 'Mixed' tells you to shuffle the letters in NUTS

clues.clue: Sound of a church bell; a number for those who have passed (4)
definitions: a number for those who have passed

clues.clue: Head of police called, for an accident (5)
clues.normalClue: P (head of police) + RANG (called) gives accident PRANG

parts.hint: What is the 'Head' of the word 'Police'

clues.clue: Snitch turns back if figurehead makes Trump Tax (6)
clues.normalClue: TAR (snitch reversed) + IF + F (figurehead) makes TAX TARIFF

parts.hint: Think of 3 letter word for snitch, then reverse the letters
What's the head of the word 'Figure'

clues.normalClue: Hidden word: NEAR appears inside 'on early' meaning close
